translations.chinese: 公等皆去，吾亦從此逝矣！」
translations.english: You all go ahead. I'll take my leave from here too!"

translations.chinese: 徒中壯士願從諸十餘人。
translations.english: Over ten strong men among the convicts wished to follow him.

translations.chinese: 高祖被酒，夜徑澤中，令一人行前。
translations.english: Emperor Gaozu was drunk and at night went directly through the marsh, ordering one man to go ahead.
The man who went ahead returned and reported: "
There is a large snake blocking the path ahead. We should turn back."
